textAfterTable: Note(s): ³ Day Uncertain MicroData Summary for Egidio Lari: Archbishop Egidio Lari (born 8 Mar 1882, died 17 Nov 1965) Titular Archbishop of Tyrus a priest for 56.1 years a bishop for 34.2 years Principal Consecrator: Luigi Cardinal Sincero † Cardinal-Priest of San Giorgio in Velabro Principal Co-Consecrators: Bishop Agostino Zampini, O.S.A. † Titular Bishop of Porphyreon Bishop Angelo Simonetti † Bishop of Pescia Episcopal Lineage / Apostolic Succession: Luigi Cardinal Sincero † (1929) Cardinal-Priest of San Giorgio in Velabro Pope Pius XI (1919) (Ambrogio Damiano Achille Ratti †) Archbishop Aleksander Kakowski † (1913) Archbishop of Warszawa {Warsaw} Bishop Stanisław Kazimierz Zdzitowiecki † (1902) Bishop of Włocławek (Kujawy, Kalisze) Bishop Jerzy Józef Elizeusz Szembek † (1901) Bishop of Płock Archbishop Bolesław Hieronim Kłopotowski † (1897) Archbishop of Mohilev Bishop Mieczyslaw Leonard Pallulon † (1883) Bishop of Žemaičiai (Samogizia o Tels; Żmudź) Bishop Szymon Marcin Kozłowski † (1883) Bishop of Lutsk, Zhytomyr, and Kamyanets-Podilskyi (Łuck, Zytomierz, and Kamienec) Bishop Aleksander Kazimierz Bereśniewicz † (1859) Bishop of Włocławek (Kujawy, Kalisze)
